name: addLink
shortDescription: Creates a link between two devices
description: This method links two devices so that they can send commands to each other directly.
signatures: Void addLink(Integer senderId, Integer senderChannel, Integer receiverId, Integer receiverChannel)
Void addLink(Integer senderId, Integer senderChannel, Integer receiverId, Integer, receiverChannel, String name, String description)
deprecatedSignatures: Void addLink(String senderAddress, String receiverAddress, String name, String description)

parameters.name: senderId
parameters.description: The id of the sending peer (e. g. a remote)

parameters.name: senderChannel
parameters.description: The channel of the sending peer or "-1"

parameters.name: receiverId
parameters.description: The id of the receiving peer (e. g. a switch)

parameters.name: receiverChannel
parameters.description: The channel of the receiving peer or "-1"

parameters.name: senderAddress
parameters.description: The serial number and channel of the sending device (e. g. a remote) seperated by colon

parameters.name: receiverAddress
parameters.description: The serial number and channel of the receiving device (e. g. a switch) seperated by colon

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A descriptive name for the link

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A short description of the link
